text: Karyn Polito (born November 11, 1966) is an American lawyer, businesswoman, and politician. She was the 72nd Lieutenant Governor of the U.S. state of Massachusetts from January 8, 2015 to January 5, 2023. Polito was a member of the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 2001 to 2011. Polito was first elected Lieutenant Governor in 2014 as the running mate of Charlie Baker. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Lieutenant Governors of Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Karyn Polito
